Industry & Professional

Publications

Directed Evolution

  1. SR Paladugu, V Chickarmane, A Deckard, JP Frumkin, M McCormack, HM Sauro, "In silico evolution of functional modules in biochemical networks," IEE Proceedings-Systems Biology, vol. 153, issue. 4, pages. 223-235, July. 2006. [doi:10.1049/ip-syb:20050096]

Non-Linear Dynamics

  1. V. Chickarmane, S. R. Paladugu, F. Bergmann and H. Sauro, "Bifurcation discovery tool," Bioinformatics, vol. 21, issue. 18, pp. 3688-3690, Sep. 2005. [doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/bti603]

Machine Learning/Network Theory

  1. S. R. Paladugu, S. Zhao, A. Ray and A. Raval, "Mining protein networks for synthetic genetic interactions" BMC Bioinformatics, vol. 9, issue. 1, pp. 426, Oct. 2008. [doi:10.1186/1471-2105-9-426]

Conference Papers, Posters, & Presentations
